mapper.sql: id, work_no, order_id, order_no, priority, problem_description, file_url, status, type, customer_id, submission_time, operator, operation_time, revert
mapper.select: select t.id, t.work_no, t.order_id, t.order_no, t.priority, t.problem_description, t.file_url, t.status, t.type, t.customer_id, t.submission_time, t.operator, t.operation_time, t.revert, t.customer_evaluation, t1.user_name customerAccount from work_order t left join customer t1 on t1.id = t.customer_id where t.id = #{id}
